verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w times|strong="G5550"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seasons|strong="G2540"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* that I write \w unto|strong="G1125"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w perfectly|strong="G0199"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w thief|strong="G2812"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* they shall \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w safety|strong="G0803"\w*; \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w sudden|strong="G0160"\w* \w destruction|strong="G3639"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2186"\w* upon \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w travail|strong="G5604"\w* \w upon|strong="G3588"\w* a \w woman|strong="G2192"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w child|strong="G1064"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w shall|strong="G1628"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w escape|strong="G1628"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* that \w day|strong="G2250"\w* should \w overtake|strong="G2638"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w thief|strong="G2812"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of the \w day|strong="G2250"\w*: we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* of the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* of \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* let \w us|strong="G2518"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w sleep|strong="G2518"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \add do\add* \w others|strong="G3062"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* let us \w watch|strong="G1127"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w sober|strong="G3525"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2518"\w* that \w sleep|strong="G2518"\w* \w sleep|strong="G2518"\w* in the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3184"\w* that be \w drunken|strong="G3182"\w* are \w drunken|strong="G3184"\w* in the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w let|strong="G3525"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w*, who \w are|strong="G5607"\w* of the \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, be \w sober|strong="G3525"\w*, putting \w on|strong="G1746"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="G2382"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* for an \w helmet|strong="G4030"\w*, the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G5087"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w appointed|strong="G5087"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w obtain|strong="G4047"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

Who \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* we \w wake|strong="G1127"\w* \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w sleep|strong="G2518"\w*, we should \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w together|strong="G0260"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* yourselves \w together|strong="G0240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w edify|strong="G3618"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w another|strong="G1520"\w*, even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w do|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we \w beseech|strong="G2065"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, to \w know|strong="G1492"\w* them which \w labour|strong="G2872"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* are \w over|strong="G4291"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w admonish|strong="G3560"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w esteem|strong="G2233"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w very|strong="G5228"\w* \w highly|strong="G4057"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w workâ€™s|strong="G2041"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w*. \add And\add* be at \w peace|strong="G1514"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* we \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w warn|strong="G3560"\w* them that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w unruly|strong="G0813"\w*, \w comfort|strong="G3888"\w* the \w feebleminded|strong="G3642"\w*, \w support|strong="G0472"\w* the \w weak|strong="G0772"\w*, be \w patient|strong="G3114"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*.

\w See|strong="G3708"\w* that \w none|strong="G3361"\w* \w render|strong="G0591"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w for|strong="G0473"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* unto \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \add man\add*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w ever|strong="G3842"\w* \w follow|strong="G1377"\w* that which is \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*.
\w Rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w evermore|strong="G3842"\w*.
\w Pray|strong="G4336"\w* without \w ceasing|strong="G0089"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* every \w thing|strong="G3956"\w* give \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* is the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.
\w Quench|strong="G4570"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.
\w Despise|strong="G1848"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w prophesyings|strong="G4394"\w*.
\w Prove|strong="G1381"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*; hold \w fast|strong="G2722"\w* that which is \w good|strong="G2570"\w*.
\w Abstain|strong="G0567"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w appearance|strong="G1491"\w* of \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w very|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w sanctify|strong="G0037"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w wholly|strong="G3651"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add I pray God\add* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w whole|strong="G3648"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* be \w preserved|strong="G5083"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0274"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
\w Faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \add is\add* he that \w calleth|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* will \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \add it.\add*
\w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*.
\w Greet|strong="G0782"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*.

I \w charge|strong="G3726"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* by the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w that|strong="G0314"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w* be \w read|strong="G0314"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. The first \add epistle\add* unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
